name: Angel, Archangel Hala’Ath
damage_immunities: radiant; nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone, unconscious

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Titanium Wings or Bolt of Law attacks.

actions.name: Spirit of Fortification
actions.desc: While within 500' of it objects and structures have a damage threshold of 10. If object or structure has damage threshold over 10 damage threshold is doubled instead.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Hala’ath moves up to half its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Summon Haladrons
legendary_actions.desc: Summons 2d4 haladrons: appear in an unoccupied space within 150' of Hala’ath and act on its turn. Once summoned they remain on same plane as Hala’ath for 1 hr until destroyed or until Hala’ath dies. Can have up to 20 haladrons summoned this way at one time.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Makes one Titanium Wings or Bolt of Law attack.

legendary_actions.name: Glorious Surge (3)
legendary_actions.desc: Bolsters up to two creatures it can see within 60' of it. Each target regains 20 (4d8+2) hp and has advantage on its next attack roll save or ability check.

special_abilities.name: Angelic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Hala’ath’s weapon attacks are magical. When they hit with any weapon deals extra 6d8 radiant (included below).

special_abilities.name: Divine Assistance
special_abilities.desc: A creature of good alignment that starts its turn within 120' of them can take Help action as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Divine Awareness
special_abilities.desc: Hala’ath knows if it hears a lie.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of enemy’s reach.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep
